basics.name: Ugur Köysüren
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer & Consultant
basics.summary: Senior IT Consultant with nearly 10 years of experience delivering scalable cloud-native applications and distributed systems. Expert in Java, Spring Boot, Kafka, Kubernetes, and AWS. Contributor to open source and active tech blogger.

work.name: Headsquare GmbH / Versicherungskammer Bayern
work.summary: Leading architecture of event-sourcing system with Kafka, reducing notification latency by 65%. Managing cloud deployments on OpenShift.

work.name: inovex Gmb
work.summary: Built caching and streaming pipelines for health tech and retail systems using Redis, GraphQL, and NATS.

work.name: isento GmbH / Public Sector Projects & KA-VKA
work.summary: Delivered secure e-government and environmental data systems, implemented OAuth2-based security for 2M+ users.
highlights: Developed an AI training platform with 3D simulation

projects.name: cBioPortal Contributor
projects.summary: Contributing to open source cancer genomics platform used globally.
highlights: Enhancing UI and improving data access APIs

projects.name: ugurkoysuren.com
projects.summary: Personal tech blog with articles on cloud, DevOps, and system design.
highlights: Top posts on Geo-Fencing & Push Notifications
